item.description:
Ok, it's true...I stole the cue sheet from a Charles River Ride" ....so the person listed as Gordon Harris on the cue sheet is incorrect but the rest of the cue sheet with the details is correct. We will do a 35 mile with an average pace of about 12mph. There is an optional extension but we'll probably just do the 35 mile segment.

http://www.crw.org/cg...

Bring a sense of humor and a zest for adventure along with a bike in good working order, plenty of water, and snacks for energy!

Helmets Required.

Please be sure to return to the site two days before the ride date to update your RSVP to either YES or NO.

Thank you,

Rob Fox,
Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: My cell on the day of the ride 617-894-8454
item.name: Ipswich - Newburyport Ride 35 Mile Ride
